column3: Latest; Phnom Penh: At 5:30 pm on Wednesday
column5: 2020 a fire broke out on the corner of Pasteur (51) and 360
column8: Phnom Penh.------The fire was successfully extinguished and caused no injuries
column9: but destroyed a motorcycle.------UPDATE: According to people at the scene
column10: at first they heard an explosion and a fire broke out on a power line
column12: igniting two motorcycles.------Residents immediately used several fire extinguishers and two fire trucks arrived at the scene to put out the fire
column13: but were unable to do so. because the electricity was not turned off. Video:------ TVFB------Phnom Penh Police
